learning_outcomes: Deepen understanding of key definitions, principles, and practices for integrating healthy boundaries in diverse vocational contexts
Evaluate and leverage reflection on ways that context, social location and power dynamics operate when setting and maintaining healthy boundaries
Surface and analyze the stakes, theoethical commitments, and guiding norms of individual and communal efforts to set and maintain healthy boundaries
Consider and cultivate practices that center healthy boundaries as integral to spiritual and personal readiness for leadership
Demonstrate a robust understanding of healthy boundaries in a context of vocational significance through an integrative research paper or project
Cultivate skills to support healthy boundaries such as self-awareness, theological reflection, attending to trauma, ethical behavior, and self-care
